Texts.Chs: 找一艘宇宙飞船并不难。离开这颗星球也不难。我有得是财富，我有得是方法。我内心深处的某些东西告诉我，这，才是我的命运; 不是成为一位衰老的神，在克鲁西斯旁边的太阳宝座上腐烂，而是去雕刻属于自己的想象中的宝座。
Texts.Eng: Finding a spaceship won't be hard. Getting off-planet won't be hard. I have the finances, and I have the means. Something in my heart is telling me that THIS is my destiny; not to become some old god, rotting on a Sunborn throne beside Kluex, but to carve my own throne in my image.

Texts.Chs: 希什给了我一块带坐标数据板。我认为这是一片属于鲛人宇宙的区域。“到这里去，”他说。“到这里去，去跟随你真正的命运。”——然后他就走了。
Texts.Eng: Hish'eth gave me a datapad with co-ordinates on it. I believe it to be a sector somewhere in Hylotl space. 'Go here,' he said. 'Go here and follow your true destiny' - and then he was gone.

Texts.Chs: 希什是对的。如果我能活下来，为什么还要信仰克鲁克斯？一旦我从塔上跳下来，我就再也没法为自己创造优势。这一切都掌握在克鲁克斯的手中。我不喜欢那些概率。我想掌控我自己的命运。
Texts.Eng: Hish'eth was right. Why settle for joining Kluex, IF I survive? Once I leap off the tower, I have no way to give myself an advantage. It all rests in the hands of Kluex. I don't like those odds. I control my own destiny.

Texts.Chs: 我将成为一股不可阻挡的力量。荆棘之翼之名将响彻宇宙。
Texts.Eng: I will become an unstoppable force. And the universe shall know the name Thornwing.
